title.rendered: Sara Underwood with more than 8.6 million followers reveals her beauty secrets after visiting Dr. Simon Ourian

content.rendered:
Sara Underwood selfie before treatment at Epione Beverly Hills

Dr. Simon Ourian, M.D., Cosmetic Dermatology expert and founder of Epione Beverly Hills

Dr. Simon Ourian performing a cosmetic procedure on a smiling female patient at his clinic.

Influencer Sara Underwood, with over 8.6 million Instagram followers, has rejuvenated her look with Neustem treatments by Dr. Simon Ourian

He has done amazing work for me”

— Sara Underwood

BEVERLY HILLS, CALIFORNIA, UNITED STATES, July 25, 2024 /EINPresswire.com/ — Social media sensation and model Sara Underwood, who boasts over 8.6 million followers on Instagram, recently revealed her stunning transformation thanks to Neustem treatments performed by the esteemed Dr. Simon Ourian at Epione Beverly Hills. Known for his innovative approach to non-surgical aesthetic procedures, Dr. Ourian continues to set the gold standard in the cosmetic industry, attracting high-profile clientele, including top influencers like Sara Underwood.

Sara Underwood sought out Dr. Ourian for his renowned expertise in advanced cosmetic treatments. Neustem, a revolutionary procedure, harnesses the power of stem cell technology to rejuvenate the skin, promoting a more youthful and radiant appearance. This cutting-edge treatment is designed to enhance natural beauty by stimulating collagen production, improving skin texture, and reducing the visible signs of aging.

Dr. Simon Ourian, founder of Epione Beverly Hills, has garnered acclaim for his groundbreaking work in aesthetic dermatology. His innovative Neustem treatment provides a non-surgical solution for skin rejuvenation, offering patients a safe and effective way to achieve a refreshed and youthful look. Dr. Ourian’s clientele includes celebrities such as Jennifer Aniston, Kim Kardashian, and Victoria Beckham, all of whom trust his expertise and artistry in delivering natural and transformative results.

“We are delighted to have Sara Underwood experience the transformative benefits of Neustem treatments,” said Dr. Ourian. “Neustem represents the future of aesthetic medicine, offering patients rejuvenated skin with minimal downtime. At Epione, we are dedicated to providing the most advanced and effective treatments available.”

Sara Underwood’s Neustem treatment involved the application of stem cell-based serums to targeted areas of her face. This non-invasive procedure promotes skin regeneration, resulting in a smoother, firmer, and more youthful complexion.

The treatment works by utilizing the regenerative properties of stem cells to stimulate the skin’s natural healing processes, enhancing elasticity, and reducing fine lines and wrinkles. With little to no downtime, patients can enjoy the benefits of Neustem almost immediately, making it a popular choice for those seeking quick and natural-looking results.

The process of Neustem treatment at Epione Beverly Hills begins with a comprehensive consultation, during which Dr. Ourian assesses the patient’s skin and discusses their aesthetic goals. The treatment itself is tailored to each individual’s needs, ensuring optimal results. Patients often report a noticeable improvement in skin tone and texture shortly after the procedure, with continued enhancements as the skin continues to regenerate over the following weeks.

“We know Sara is used to building amazing cabins at Cabin Land,” joked Dr. Ourian, “but we’re thrilled she trusted us to do a little ‘building’ of our own with her skin!”

Epione Beverly Hills, renowned for its luxurious setting and state-of-the-art facilities, offers an unparalleled experience in aesthetic care. The clinic’s commitment to using the latest technologies and innovative techniques sets it apart as a leader in the field of cosmetic dermatology. Dr. Ourian and his team of experts strive to provide each patient with personalized care and exceptional results.

For more information about Neustem treatments and other advanced aesthetic services offered by Dr. Simon Ourian at Epione Beverly Hills, please visit www.epionebh.com or call/text (310)651-6267

About Epione Beverly Hills

Epione Beverly Hills, founded by Dr. Simon Ourian, is a premier medical spa specializing in state-of-the-art aesthetic treatments. With a focus on non-surgical procedures, Epione offers a range of services designed to enhance natural beauty and boost self-confidence. Dr. Ourian’s innovative techniques and commitment to excellence have made Epione a trusted destination for celebrities and clients worldwide.

Simon Ourian
Epione Medical Corporation
